(#{item.acctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.queryDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isNotDownload,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
